GET IN TOUCH

If you have a query or concern, simply write to us, and we will get back to you regarding your personal or business queries. We are all ears.

  • customercare@brf.com

  • (UAE) +800 723 42  |  (+971) 4 366 2177

FAQs

We know that when consumers taste a Sadia product, their expectations are very high. Therefore, we apply strict standards on quality and food safety. We have a vertically integrated supply chain, which gives us full control of every step of the process all the way to the supermarket shelf. We guarantee food safety and highest quality standards so that you and your loved ones can enjoy tasty and healthy food every day.
